pr_title: Update java version parser for presto running on java 10, 11 or later

timeline.message: Update java version parser for java 10, 11 or later

timeline.author: mbasmanova
timeline.diffHunk:
@@ -27,8 +27,8 @@
 // TODO: remove this when we upgrade to Java 9 (replace with java.lang.Runtime.getVersion())

replies.bodyText: Yes, we could use java.lang.Runtime.getVersion() instead of the version parser once we upgrade the minimum java version from 8 to 9.
replies.author: beinan
